dcterms:creator: Rémi Lebret
David Grangier
Michael Auli
dcterms:description: The WikiBio corpus comprises 728,321 biography-infobox pairs from English Wikipedia. The task consists of generating the first sentence of a biography conditioned on the structured infobox.
dcterms:title: WikiBio

dcterms:creator: Ondˇrej Dušek
Jekaterina Novikova
Verena Rieser
dcterms:description: The E2E challenge is based on a crowd-sourced dataset of 50k samples in the restaurant domain. The task is to generate a description of a restaurant from structured input in the form of key-value pairs.
dcterms:title: E2E

dcterms:creator: Rik Koncel-Kedziorski
Dhanush Bekal
Yi Luan
Mirella Lapata
Hannaneh Hajishirzi
dcterms:description: AGENDA dataset comprises 40,720 scientific abstracts, each supplemented with the title and a matching knowledge graph. The goal of the task is to generate an abstract given the title and the associated knowledge graph as the source.
dcterms:title: AGENDA

dcterms:creator: Claire Gardent
Anastasia Shimorina
Shashi Narayan
Laura Perez-Beltrachini
dcterms:description: WebNLG dataset consists of sets of (head, predicate, tail) tuples forming a graphical structure and a descriptive target text verbalizing them. The dataset consists of 25,298 graph-text pairs.
dcterms:title: WebNLG

dcterms:creator: Alistair EW Johnson
Tom J Pollard
Lu Shen
H Lehman Li-wei
Mengling Feng
Mohammad Ghassemi
Benjamin Moody
Peter Szolovits
Leo Anthony Celi
Roger G Mark
dcterms:description: MIMIC-III is a freely accessible critical care database that includes clinical data for patients admitted to critical care units. It is used for generating clinical notes from the medical entities mentioned during clinical visits.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III
